PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11042023-11-03ESDC
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
Canada Student Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations and the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS and the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to allow a family physician to be eligible for up to a maximum of $60,000 in loan forgiveness and a nurse or nurse practitioner to be eligible for up to $30,000 in loan forgiveness over five years.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0227 Publication Date: 2023-11-22
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Canada Student Financial Assistance ActCanada Student Loans Act
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations and the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS and the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to allow a family physician to be eligible for up to a maximum of $60,000 in loan forgiveness and a nurse or nurse practitioner to be eligible for up to $30,000 in loan forgiveness over five years.
